product_name: Pearl Izumi P.R.O. In-R-Cool Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Known for fit, performance and durability, the men's Pearl Izumi P.R.O. In-R-Cool Bike Shorts take comfort to a new level thanks to cooling fabric technology. P.R.O. In-R-Cool(R) fabric powered by coldblack(R) provides optimal wicking, fast drying and reflective sun protection to keep you cool. Anatomical seamless P.R.O. chamois is designed for advanced performance riders, for training and racing. Wide elastic leg bands have sublimated graphics and silicone elements for grip so the shorts stay in place. Reflective accents enhance visibility in low light. Pearl Izumi P.R.O. In-R-Cool Bike Shorts offer UPF 50+ sun protection.
